      public Projectile(org.bukkit.entity.LivingEntity caster, ProjectileSpell spell, float speed, int length, boolean hasNoGravity, org.bukkit.entity.Entity passenger)
      Create a new projectile
      Parameters:
      caster - The caster of the spell
      spell - The spell that was cast
      speed - The speed of the projectile
      length - The length of the projectile
      hasNoGravity - If the projectile is affected by velocity changes
      passenger - The passenger of the projectile

    • Projectile

      public Projectile(org.bukkit.entity.LivingEntity caster, ProjectileSpell spell, float speed, int length, boolean hasNoGravity, org.bukkit.entity.Entity passenger, double yOffset)
      Create a new projectile with a different height
      Parameters:
      caster - The caster of the spell
      spell - The spell that was cast
      speed - The speed of the projectile
      length - The length of the projectile
      hasNoGravity - If the projectile is affected by velocity changes
      passenger - The passenger of the projectile
      yOffset - The y offset spawn height of the projectile
